turkish_example_sentence: Ben ilginç bir hikaye anlatsam, çocuklar mutlu olurlar.
english_example_sentence: If I were to tell an interesting story, the children would be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я рассказал интересную историю, дети были бы счастливы.
